Manta has 1,131 companies under Cafes Companies in North Carolina
+ Add Your Company for Free Top Featured Companies
Moroccan Oasis Hookah Lounge 3018 Hillsborough St , Raleigh NC 27607 map 0 Recommendations Moroccan Oasis is the best and most popular hookah bar in town. We provide a huge variety of flavors. The atmosphere is by far the best in Raleigh.
Folks Cafe 1201 Princess St , Wilmington NC 28401-4337 map 0 Recommendations Cozy coffee shop/espresso bar/tea house. Best coffee in town! We are the only place in town that roast their own coffee on site. Please join us for great coffee and typical Argentine delicacies as well as simple breakfast and sandwiches.
Patty Cakes Cafe 1908 Haywood Rd , Hendersonville NC 28791-9058 map 0 Recommendations Patty Cakes Cafe 7 Days A Week - Serving Tea, Hot Coffee, Baked Goods, Breakfast&Lunch Patty Cakes Cafe is a local breakfast and lunch spot. It has become a daily home away from home for many people. It is a great place to enjoy good food at reasonable prices. Daily blue plate specials, salads and sandwiches are offered for lunch. But if you are in the mood for breakfast, stop by, it is served all day.
Coffee? Head on up to the coffee counter to serve yourself a cup of HAV A CUP coffee. Baked goods line the front counter tempting you to indulge. They are worth it.
Howdy Neighbor Cafe 1115 Main St NW , Lenoir NC 28645-3913 map 0 Recommendations Nice,clean,friendly place to eat Best Hamburgers and Hot Dogs in town
Addie's Main St Cafe' Llc 439 Main Street , Tarboro NC 27886 map 0 Recommendations David and Addie Lewis have owned Addie's Catering for the last 12 years and have now expanded to a permanent location on Main Street in Historic Dow Addie's Main Street Cafe is located in historic downtown Tarboro, across from town hall and Tarboro Savings.
A Taste Of Heavenly Sweetness 805 N Main st , High Point NC 27263 map 0 Recommendations
Moose South 570 Brevard Road # 3 , Asheville NC 28806-2324 map 0 Recommendations Family Style Country Restaurants Moose Cafe is a company that owns 2 restaurants each located on the grounds of Farmer's Markets in North Carolina. We are local farm to table restaurants, open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Our first location is located in Asheville at the Western North Carolina market. Our second location is located on the grounds of the Piedmont Triad Farmer's market. We are family owned and operated company.
J's Internet Cafe 3308 Bragg Blvd. , Fayetteville NC 28303 map 0 Recommendations Internet Sweepstakes Gaming Internet Sweepstakes Gaming - Brand New Computers with Large Screens and Comfortable Leather Chairs. We offer both smoking and non-smoking room.
Moroccan Oasis Cafe Inc 3018 Hillsborough St , Raleigh NC 27607-5446 map 0 Recommendations Hookah bar with full service coffee Hookah bar with full service coffee
